website_summaries.verdict: These heavy-duty shepherd's hooks are capable of holding an impressive amount of weight. Durable and made to last.
pros: Sturdy enough to hold everything from bird feeders to flower pots
Powder coated finish holds up to harsh weather
cons: Loses a few inches of length when staked
Manufacturer stickers can leave a residue after being removed

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdiness: A solid 5, as long as you plug these correctly and evenly into the dirt, they'll stand there. I live in Kentucky, so I don't experience a lot of high speed wind. Installation: 5/5. Just place on top of desired spot of your lawn. Value for money: 3/5. These aren't necessarily cheap but they are durable. I wouldn't expect any kind of warping as long as its appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: si.yrxkrru1t3177Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: they're study and look nice out of the box. after first drizzle, i noticed they're painted, and a couple chipped during shipping and now rusting. was planning to return, but decided to suck it up, they're the only study ones i could find online.
customer_reviews.author: LSA

customer_reviews.title: Simple but small
customer_reviews.text: I did not keep these hooks. I wanted to hang bird feeders on them. They were shorter than I expected. By the time I would have put them in the ground the birds would have practically been feeding on the ground. I suppose they would be fine for hanging plants.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I ordered these hooks instead of others I had seen. These are very sturdy, and all one piece. My plan is to use them in the summer months around the pool, to hold baskets containing sunscreen, goggles and other pool related items.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Stayed upright even in bad storms and wind
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hold up skeletons for Halloween decor in my yard. These were easy to push into the soil and sturdy enough to withstand strong wind. I bought more to add more skeletons!
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, sturdy and price is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these, they are sturdy and have enough weight to hold just about anything. I bought a four pack to put one in each corner of my yard and it holds an electric mosquito buzzer thing. The mosquito things were such a good deal I bought multiple and needed to hang them without making them permanent.
customer_reviews.author: saisa

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy hanging baskets, and these hooks hold hold them well. I just wish they had been a little cheaper. But, as far as the product goes, I definitely give it 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: M. J-Russell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Study
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how heavy these were but it makes for a nice sturdy stand that I hung outdoor lanterns on. I bought the 48” tall ones which are perfect . I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to hold a set of solar lanterns by the front door and these seem to be the ticket. The wind in Tx. can be strong and I needed these to hold the lights. I liked them and may get more.
customer_reviews.author: TIM4983

customer_reviews.title: Depending on hanging heavy plants these won't work.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if our hanging baskets are heavier than most or what, but the bends way over when I tried to hangs plants on them! Planning on hangi
customer_reviews.author: PeggyLee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than i thought
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value. Works great for my bird feeders and hummingbird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: better than I expect, tall, easy to install, deep hooks so planters dont fall off
customer_reviews.author: Junie Q

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy, we use them to put our speakers on. Good in bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Won’t find anything that cheap in the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: sharon harland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: I really like these posts cuz they hold my flowers in my rock garden up off the rocks and really look nice..
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not tall enough
customer_reviews.text: I like the hooks fine, but they were not tall enough for Birdhouses to put in front of the windows of Assisted Living Centers. The hooks were too short for the residents to see if they were looking out the windows to see the birds eat. I was looking for something a foot or taller and found them at a local department store and they were super sturdy and held the birdhouses at the correct height, the only problem was they only had 4 I needed about 6. The prices were much cheaper and that was even better.
customer_reviews.author: David Menze

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about 15 of these to hold hanging solar lights in my backyard. They look nice with the lights. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mellow

product_meta.title: Ashman Black Shepherd Hook 48 Inch (4 Pack), 10MM Thick, Super Strong, Rust Resistant Steel Hook Ideal for Use at Weddings, Hanging Plant Baskets, Solar Lights, Lanterns, Bird Feeders and More
feature_bullets: DYNAMIC USES: This 48 inch high 10MM (0.4 inch) diameter thick and 10 inches wide Shepherd hooks will add beauty to your outdoor living space by hanging wide variety of solar lights, signs, flowers baskets, bird feeders, mason jars, string lights, wind chimes, ornaments, plant hanger, etc.

PREMIUM QUALITY: Super quality steel construction which is 30% more thicker than competition. Powder coating which will last for many seasons to come if not forever and these hooks are easy to carry and move around your garden
STUNNING: Vintage look and black finish will adds elegance and beauty to your garden. These hooks have an outstanding shine and look stunning in almost any garden landscape.

MULTI-FACETED: Endless uses of these hooks and only your imagination can limit you and some of the uses we suggest are: hanging wedding decoration, insect repellents, shooting targets, isle markers, at campgrounds. You will be amazed at how useful they can be.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE:: With a life-time guarantee, Ashman offers a full-refund if you're not satisfied!
